name: PMD-Roleplay Galaxy Theme
description:
A simple swap of backgrounds for the PMD roleplay forum on forumotion.
It swaps out the background with a galaxy image that was made for this purpose.
It adds borders to the site's contents and outlines that make it fade into the background better.
